name: Guardians of Kaellia
description:
Hi dear Guardians !Thank you so much for taking a look at this page ! 

Guardians of Kaellia is a survival game, in which you need to protect your people called the 'Guardians'  (you didn't see this one coming, did you ? 😉 ) and help them in their quest, as they are trying to protect the sacred land of Kaellia from an undead army. 

Develop your camp, summon new Guardians, and upgrade them to different classes ! The stronger they get, the more likely you will protect Kaellia !
